item.title: Warren Buffett was still searching for that elephant to buy in his final months as Berkshire CEO
item.description: Warren Buffett, who handed over the CEO reins to Greg Abel at the start of 2026, made it clear that size is not the constraint, opportunity is.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: JPMorgan, Moderna, Boeing, Cardinal Health, Chipotle & more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest midday moves.

item.title: JPMorgan is lower after better-than-expected results. Is it a buying opportunity?
item.description: Wall Street analysts largely framed the pullback as profit-taking rather than a fundamental shift in the outlook.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase says banks could fight Trump credit card rate cap: 'Everything's on the table'
item.description: Banks say a proposed 10% cap on credit card interest rates would result in fewer credit card accounts for Americans and a hit to the U.S. economy.

item.title: Republican Sen. Thom Tillis vows to block Trump's Fed nominees following Powell probe
item.description: Trump will face an important obstacle — from within his own party — as he seeks to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.
